Blacksmith of Mammon: I'll make an even exchange of weapons with you. For example, I will exchange a Mithril Dagger for a two-handed Claymore of the same level. However, there are a couple of things you should know. *Special abilities* don't transfer. *Enchantments* do transfer with exchange.
